turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi there! How can I help?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I make an order for the pizza from that place called Bella Luna?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing! what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to get four large, pepperoni pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. Can you make one of those meat combo pizza, extra meat.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let me repeat that again. Can you make one.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Meat Lovers, one Veggie Lovers, one chicken barbecue, and one pepperoni?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I see, one second!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 4 large pizzas, one meat lovers, another veggie lovers, the 3rd BBQ chicken and lastly a pepperoni, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, can you make it can you make the the bunny one with a thick crust and the other one regular?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, i'll add thin crust to the pepperoni pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right. Can you also add a drink, a large Coke Zero?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, is a 2 liter bottle okay?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you tell me this?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you tell me the total price, and when can I pick it up?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, the total will be $62.44.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, one moment while I send your order to Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right. Thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, your pizzas are in the works and should be ready for pickup in 40 min.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks. Sounds good to me. Thank you. Bye-bye.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Bye bye!
